tags.documentation:
Analog Output to Devices that uses current input like (4-20mA, 0-20mA) or voltage input like (0-10V, 0-5V, -5-5V, -10-10V) will be using this UDT.

This UDT is assuming PLC / IIoT is providing this exact same function.
tags.name: plc_opcua_beckhoff

alarms.notes: Could be disconnected or device malfunction.
alarms.name: fail alarm
